name: Graveyard Dash (1DayGames)
description:
A game made in a week for Halloween!

Story:

You are a zombie freshly awoken from the grave, trying to escape death himself! He wants to drag your soulless corpse back to the underworld. You can run but you can't hide, Zomboi!

Controls:

Z : Jump

X : Slide

X while in air : Dive Kick

Spacebar : Pause

R : Restart Level

Cast:

Zomboi

Death

Pumpkin

Jack

Bimpson

Bruce

Arizona

Dave Nicklefield

Giggles

Boris

Emperor Spooky

Credit:

Some of the SFX:

Programmers wife for the trees. <3

Side note:

Happy Halloween!
